description.part1: We used to dream about this stuff. Now we get to build it. It's pretty great.
description.part2: Steven Paul Jobs, Apple Worldwide Developers Conference (June 2004)

inputName.label: Enter your name
inputName.title: The name can only be from three to 30 letters, apostrophe, dash and spaces. For example Adrian, Jac Mercer, d'Artagnan, Александр Репета etc.

inputEmail.label: Enter your email
inputEmail.title: Email can consist of letters, numbers and a required character '@'

inputPassword.label: Enter your password
inputPassword.title: The password can be at least six letters of numbers and symbols '!@#$%^&*'

inputPassword1.label: Enter your password again
inputPassword1.title: The password can be at least six letters of numbers and symbols '!@#$%^&*'
